name: RAVI (GDH_Studio, Ray, Limah1, Gabriel Penha, Breno Mancini)
name_original: RAVI (GDH_Studio, Ray, Limah1, Gabriel Penha, Breno Mancini)
description:
Explore and reach further.
In this place you are free to rise and find your self.
Hope you find some friends along the way.

Jump, grapple and double jump!

Move trough plataforms  and try to reach the (current) end.

Directed by: Breno Mancini and Gabriel Lima

Proggramme by: Breno Mancini

Game design by: Breno Mancini and Gabriel Lima

Level design by :Breno Mancini and Gabriel Lima

2D art by: Ray Torres

Audio design, composition and implemetation by: Galiontth (Gabriel Penha)
